headline: IQVIA Receives WCG Pinnacle Award for Excellence in Site Relationships
summary: RESEARCH TRIANGLE PARK, N.C., September 16, 2025--IQVIA (NYSE:IQV), a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries, has been honored with the WCG Pinnacle Award for Site Relationships in Professionalism and Communication. The award recognizes IQVIA’s commitment to building strong, collaborative partnerships with clinical trial sites worldwide.
